Articles.Content:
My kerbal space program crashes as soon as it launches. I have the steam version of the game on a 64-bit operating system.

Here is my system information: https://www.dropbox.com/s/ebeqwrziuv5qo8l/DxDiag.txt?dl=0

Here is the output_log: https://www.dropbox.com/s/z2mrtmnn5au22dm/output_log.txt?dl=0

I purchased Kerbal space program a few months ago and it worked fine, but now it will not launch. It goes to a white screen before it even loads the menu and says "KSP.exe is not responding".

I have tried:

Re-installing the game from steam

Verifying integrity of game cache

Restarting my computer

Deleting all of my mods

Please help!
